name: Roll for Safety
description:
Submission to GDTK GameJam 2022.

Tactical game of manoeuvring around enemies to reach a goal, with randomized stats. 

As long as you have rerolls left, you can get a fresh roll on your stats and reset the ever-climbing difficulty; but you don't know how good your new stats will be.

On the other hand, you can save your rerolls and face the increasing difficulty to get more rerolls in your stock, assuming you have strong enough stats to survive.

WASD to move. Shift for Dash. Space for Jump. F for Magic.

Executable runs without any known bugs, however some bugs on WebGL version:

- Smooth movement disabled.

- Character can randomly become stuck, push 'Q' to become unstuck.
